member.name: M:Orion.Clients.Services.DateTimeService.ReplaceWith24HourClockFormat(System.String)
member.summary: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.globalization.datetimeformatinfo(v=vs.110).aspx For many cultures in the .NET Framework, the time is expressed by using a 12-hour clock and an AM/PM designator. The following example defines a ReplaceWith24HourClock method that replaces any time format that uses a 12-hour clock with a format that uses a 24-hour clock.

member.name: M:Orion.Clients.Services.IDateTimeService.ConvertWithClientTimezone(System.DateTimeOffset,System.String)
member.summary: Applies the client's timezone setting to the given date.
member.param: Time zone id from client layer settings.
member.exception: throws when the given DateTimeOffset is not UTC.

member.name: M:Orion.Clients.Services.IDateTimeService.ParseDateTimeOffset(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Parses the given string to a DateTimeOffset using the current layer setting.
member.remarks: The string can be a date-part only or datetimeoffset string.
member.param: string representation of a datetime in the current layer setting format.
The name of current culture in division settings. This is used to retrieve the date format.
member.returns: DateTimeOffset parsed using the current layer setting culture format IFF the given string could be parsed, null otherwise.

member.name: M:Orion.Clients.Services.IDateTimeService.ParseDateTimeOffset(System.String,System.Int64)
member.summary: Parses the given string to a DateTimeOffset using the current layer setting.
member.remarks: The string can be a date-part only or datetimeoffset string.
member.param: string representation of a datetime in the current layer setting format.
Identifier of the layer to parse the given date time offset string for. This is used to retrieve the date format.
member.returns: DateTimeOffset parsed using the current layer setting culture format IFF the given string could be parsed, null otherwise.

member.name: M:Orion.Clients.Services.IDateTimeService.ConvertDateTimeToClientFormatDateTimeString(System.DateTimeOffset,Orion.Clients.Enums.TimeDisplayFormatTypes,System.String)
member.summary: Converts the DateTimeOffset to client format date time string using the current layer setting.
member.param: The name of current culture in division settings. This is used to retrieve the date format.
member.returns: String contained date time in format specified in client settings.
member.exception: throws when the given DateTimeOffset is not UTC.

member.name: M:Orion.Clients.Services.IDateTimeService.ConvertDateTimeToClientFormatDateTimeStringWithClientTimezone(System.DateTimeOffset,Orion.Clients.Enums.TimeDisplayFormatTypes,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Applies the client's timezone setting to the given date and converts it to string in appropriate format using the current layer setting.
member.param: The name of current culture in division settings. This is used to retrieve the date format.
Time zone id from client layer settings.
member.returns: String contained date time in client timezone and in format specified in client settings.
member.exception: throws when the given DateTimeOffset is not UTC.

member.summary: Adjust day light time by daylight delta.
